products.title: Unishade Blackout FR Mulberry Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unishade blackout fr mulberry purple roller blind in purple. Made to measure from 10.36 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Offering complete light blockage & resistentance to moisture. Their stunning unishade range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2403 fabric colour: mulberry purple material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
